entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High zero.
